info.name: YouTrack REST API
info.description:
Welcome to the [YouTrack](jetbrains.com/youtrack) workspace! Here you will find a collection of requests that you can make with the YouTrack REST API. This collection is maintained by the YouTrack team. If you have any questions related to the collection or to the YouTrack REST API, please send us a message to `youtrack-support@jetbrains.com`. To use this collection, fork it to your workspace and change the collection variables to the values relevant to your environment. For the full YouTrack REST API documentation, see [YouTrack REST API Reference](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/youtrack-rest-api.html). #### Main Collection Variables Set these two main variables and you can start using the YouTrack REST API collection. | **Variable** | **Description** | | --- | --- | | baseUrl | The Base REST API URL of the YouTrack service.
For more info, see [REST API URL and Endpoints](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-url-and-endpoints.html). | | token | The permanent token for the user account that you use to log in to YouTrack.
For more info on how to create a permanent token, see [Create a Permanent Token](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/Manage-Permanent-Token.html#obtain-permanent-token). | #### Additional Variables You will need some of these variables for specific requests. Check the documentation for each request to find out if you need any additional variables for it. | **Variable** | **Description** | | --- | --- | | activityItemID | The database ID of a sample activity item.
To get the ID of an [activity item](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-ActivityItem.html) in an issue, send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues-issueID-comments.html#get_all-IssueComment-method) to `/api/issues/{{sampleIssue}}/activities?fields=id,author(name,login),timestamp,target(id,text)&categories={{Category}}` and find the ID of the target activity item. To learn about available activity categories, see [ActivityCategory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-ActivityCategory.html). | | agileBoardID | The database ID of a sample agile board.
To get the ID of an [agile board](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-Agile.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-agiles.html#get_all-Agile-method) to `/api/agiles?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target agile board. | | articleID | The ID of a sample article. In most requests, you can use the article ID as seen in the interface.
To get the database ID of an [article](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-Article.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-articles.html#get_all-Article-method) to `/api/articles?fields=id,summary` and find the ID of the target article. | | articleAttachmentID | The database ID of a sample article attachment.
To get the ID of an [article attachment](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-ArticleAttachment.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-articles-articleID-attachments.html#get_all-ArticleAttachment-method) to `/api/articles/{{articleID}}/attachments?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target article attachment. | | articleCommentID | The database ID of a sample comment to an article.
To get the ID of a [comment](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-ArticleComment.html) to an article, send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-articles-articleID-comments.html#get_all-ArticleComment-method) to `/api/articles/{{articleID}}/comments?fields=id,author(id,name),text,created` and find the ID of the target comment. | | backupFileName | The name of a sample backup file.
To get the name of a [backup file](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-BackupFile.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-databaseBackup-backups.html#get_all-BackupFile-method) to `/api/admin/databaseBackup/backups?fields=id,name` and find the name of the target backup file. | | buildBundleID | The database ID of a sample set of build custom field values.
To get the ID of a [BuildBundle](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-BuildBundle.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-build.html#get_all-BuildBundle-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/build?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target build bundle. | | buildBundleElementID | The database ID of a sample value from a set of build custom field values.
To get the ID of a [BuildBundleElement](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-BuildBundleElement.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-build-bundleID-values.html#get_all-BuildBundleElement-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/build/{{buildBundleID}}/values?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target build element. | | customFieldID | The database ID of a sample common custom field.
To get the ID of a [CustomField](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-CustomField.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-customFields.html#get_all-CustomField-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/customFields?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target custom field. | | enumBundleID | The database ID of a sample set of enum custom field values.
To get the ID of an [EnumBundle](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-EnumBundle.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-enum.html#get_all-EnumBundle-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/enum?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target enum bundle. | | enumBundleElementID | The database ID of a sample value from a set of enum custom field values.
To get the ID of an [EnumBundleElement](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-EnumBundleElement.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-enum-bundleID-values.html#get_all-EnumBundleElement-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/enum/{{enumBundleID}}/values?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target enum element. | | groupID | The database ID of a sample user group.
To get the ID of a [user group](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-UserGroup.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-groups.html#get_all-UserGroup-method) to `/api/groups?fields=id,login` and find the ID of the target user group. | | issue | The human-readable ID of a sample [issue](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-Issue.html). In most requests, you can use the issue ID as seen in the interface. | | issueID | The database ID of a sample issue.
To get the ID of an [issue](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-Issue.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues.html#get_all-Issue-method) to `/api/issues?fields=id,summary` and find the ID of the target issue. | | issueAttachmentID | The database ID of a sample issue attachment.
To get the ID of an [issue attachment](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueAttachment.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues-issueID-attachments.html#get_all-IssueAttachment-method) to `/api/issues/{{sampleIssue}}/attachments?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target issue attachment. | | issueCommentID | The database ID of a sample comment to an issue.
To get the ID of an [issue comment](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueComment.html) to an issue, send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues-issueID-comments.html#get_all-IssueComment-method) to `/api/issues/{{sampleIssue}}/comments?fields=id,text` and find the ID of the target comment. | | issueCustomFieldID | The database ID of a sample issue custom field.
To get the ID of an [IssueCustomField](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueCustomField.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues-issueID-customFields.html#get_all-IssueCustomField-method) to `/api/issues/{{sampleIssue}}/fields?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target issue custom field. | | issueLinkID | The database ID of a sample link between two issues.
To get the name of an [issue link](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueLink.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues-issueID-links.html#get_all-IssueLink-method) to `/api/issues/{{sampleIssue}}/links?fields=id,idReadable,direction,linkType(name,localizedName,sourceToTarget,targetToSource,directed,aggregation),issues(id,idReadable,summary)` and find the ID of the target issue link. | | issueLinkTypeID | The database ID of a sample issue link type.
To get the ID of an [issue link type](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueLinkType.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issueLinkTypes.html#get_all-IssueLinkType-method) to `/api/issueLinkTypes?fields=id,name,aggregation,directed,sourceToTarget,targetToSource` and find the ID of the target link type. | | issueTagID | The database ID of a sample issue tag.
To get the ID of a [tag](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueTag.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issueTags.html#get_all-IssueTag-method) to `/api/issueTags?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target tag. | | ownedBundleID | The database ID of a sample set of owned custom field values.
To get the ID of an [OwnedBundle](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-OwnedBundle.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-ownedField.html#get_all-OwnedBundle-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/ownedField?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target owned bundle. | | ownedBundleElementID | The database ID of a sample value from a set of owned custom field values.
To get the ID of an [OwnedBundleElement](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-OwnedBundleElement.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-ownedField-bundleID-values.html#get_all-OwnedBundleElement-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/ownedField/{{ownedBundleID}}/values?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target owned element. | | periodProjectCustomFieldID | The database ID of a sample project custom field of period type.
To get the ID of a [PeriodProjectCustomField](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-PeriodProjectCustomField.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-projects-projectID-customFields.html#get_all-ProjectCustomField-method) to `/api/admin/projects/{{sampleProjectID}}/customFields?fields=id,field(name,fieldType)` and find the ID of the target period custom field. | | projectID | The database ID of a sample project.
To get the ID of a [project](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-Project.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-projects.html#get_all-Project-method) to `/api/admin/projects?fields=id,name,shortName` and find the ID of the target project. | | projectCustomFieldID | The database ID of a sample project custom field.
To get the ID of a [ProjectCustomField](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-ProjectCustomField.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-projects-projectID-customFields.html#get_all-ProjectCustomField-method) to `/api/admin/projects/{{sampleProjectID}}/customFields?fields=id,field(name,fieldType)` and find the ID of the target project custom field. | | savedQueryID | The database ID of a sample saved search.
To get the ID of a [saved search](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-SavedQuery.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-savedQueries.html#get_all-SavedQuery-method) to `/api/savedQueries?fields=id,name,query` and find the ID of the target saved search. | | sprintID | The database ID of a sample sprint on an agile board.
To get the ID of a [sprint](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-Sprint.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-agiles-agileID-sprints.html#get_all-Sprint-method) to `/api/agiles/{{agileBoardID}}/sprints?fields=id,name,start,finish` and find the ID of the target sprint. | | stateBundleID | The database ID of a sample set of state custom field values.
To get the ID of a [StateBundle](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-StateBundle.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-state.html#get_all-StateBundle-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/state?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target state bundle. | | stateBundleElementID | The database ID of a sample value from a set of state custom field values.
To get the ID of an [StateBundleElement](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-StateBundleElement.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-state-bundleID-values.html#get_all-StateBundleElement-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/state/{{stateBundleID}}/values?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target state element. | | subArticleID | The database ID of a sample sub-article.
To get the ID of a [sub-article](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-Article.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-articles-articleID-childArticles.html#get_all-Article-method) to `/api/articles/{{articleID}}/childArticles?fields=id,summary,idReadable` and find the ID of the target sub-article. | | userID | The database ID of a sample user.
To get the ID of a [user](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-User.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-users.html#get_all-User-method) to `/api/users?fields=id,login` and find the ID of the target user. | | userBundleID | The database ID of a sample set of users.
To get the ID of a [UserBundle](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-UserBundle.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-user.html#get_all-UserBundle-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/user?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target user bundle. | | versionBundleID | The database ID of a sample set of version custom field values.
To get the ID of a [VersionBundle](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-VersionBundle.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-version.html#get_all-VersionBundle-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/version?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target version bundle. | | versionBundleElementID | The database ID of a sample value from a set of version custom field values.
To get the ID of an [VersionBundleElement](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-VersionBundleElement.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-customFieldSettings-bundles-version-bundleID-values.html#get_all-VersionBundleElement-method) to `/api/admin/customFieldSettings/bundles/versrion/{{versionBundleID}}/values?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target version element. | | workItemID | The database ID of a sample work item.
To get the ID of a [work item](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueWorkItem.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues-issueID-timeTracking-workItems.html#get_all-IssueWorkItem-method) to `/api/issues/{{sampleIssue}}/timeTracking/workItems?fields=id,author(id,name),date,duration(id,minutes,presentation)` and find the ID of the target work item. | | workItemTypeID | The database ID of a sample work item type.
To get the ID of a [work item type](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-WorkItemType.html), send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-timeTrackingSettings-workItemTypes.html#get_all-WorkItemType-method) to `/api/admin/timeTrackingSettings/workItemTypes?fields=id,name` and find the ID of the target work item type. |

item.name: Read a List of Activity Items

request.description:
Get the list of all available activities.

https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-activities.html#get_all-ActivityItem-method

response.name: 200 Read a List of VersionBundleElements
response.body:
[
    {
        "releaseDate": null,
        "released": false,
        "description": null,
        "archived": false,
        "name": "October sprint",
        "id": "103-403",
        "$type": "VersionBundleElement"
    },
    {
        "releaseDate": null,
        "released": false,
        "description": null,
        "archived": false,
        "name": "Unscheduled",
        "id": "103-404",
        "$type": "VersionBundleElement"

Put the ID of the project into the `sampleProject` variable or replace the variable with the project ID in the URL.

[https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/operations-api-admin-projects.html#get-Project-method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/operations-api-admin-projects.html#get-Project-method)

item.description:
This resource provides access to projects.

[https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/operations-api-admin-projects.html](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/operations-api-admin-projects.html)

request.description:
Get a list of all available projects in the system.

[https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-projects.html#get_all-Project-method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-projects.html#get_all-Project-method)

response.name: 200 Read a List of Projects

request.description:
When creating a new project, you must provide project's name, short name, and the project leader. Other attributes are optional. To create a project that is based on a template, like Scrum or Kanban, you need to add `template` query parameter to the endpoint URL.

Put the ID of the project leader into the `sampleUser` variable or replace the variable with the project ID in the request body.

[https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-projects.html#create-Project-method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-projects.html#create-Project-method)

request.description:
Delete the issue. Note that this operation can not be undone.

Put the ID of the issue into the `sampleIssue` variable or replace the variable with the issue ID in the URL.

[https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/operations-api-issues.html#delete-Issue-method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/operations-api-issues.html#delete-Issue-method)

Get all issues that match specified query. If the query is not provided, the server returns all issues.

[https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues.html#get_all-Issue-method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues.html#get_all-Issue-method)

response.name: 200 Read a List of Issues -- Sample 1
200 Read a List of Issues -- Sample 2

request.description:
Create new issue.

Put the ID of the project into the `sampleProject` variable or replace the variable with the project ID in the request body.

To get the project ID, send a [GET request](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-admin-projects.html#get_all-Project-method) to `/api/admin/projects?fields=id,name,shortName` and find the ID of the target project.

[https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues.html#create-Issue-method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues.html#create-Issue-method)

item.description:
#### Issues Resource that provides access to issues. [https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues.html](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/resource-api-issues.html) ###### Issue Attributes | **Attribute** | **Type** | **Description** | | --- | --- | --- | | idReadable | String | The issue ID. `Read-only`. | | created | Long | The timestamp of the moment when the issue was created. `Read-only`. `Can be null`. | | updated | Long | The timestamp of the last update of the issue. `Read-only`. `Can be null`. | | resolved | Long | The timestamp of the moment when the issue was assigned a state that is considered to be resolved. Returns `null` if the issue is still in an unresolved state. `Read-only`. `Can be null`. | | numberInProject | Long | The issue number in the project. `Read-only`. | | project | [
Project](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-Project.html) | The project to which the issue is assigned. `Can be null`. | | summary | String | The text that is entered as the issue summary. Can be null. | | description | String | The text that is entered as the issue description. `Can be null`. | | usesMarkdown | Boolean | When `true`, the issue description is parsed as Markdown. When `false`, the issue description is parsed as YouTrack Wiki. Changing this value does not transform the markup from one syntax to another. | | wikifiedDescription | String | Issue description as it is shown in UI after processing with wiki/markdown (including HTML markup). `Read-only`. | | reporter | [User](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-User.html) |

The user who reported (created) the issue. `Read-only`. `Can be null`.

| | updater | [User](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-User.html) |

The user who last updated the issue. `Read-only`. `Can be null`.

| | draftOwner | [
User](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-User.html) | Creator of this draft if issue is a draft, null if issue was already reported. `Read-only`. `Can be null`. | | isDraft | Boolean |

`true` if issue is a draft, `false` if it was already reported. `Read-only`.

| | visibility | [Visibility](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-Visibility.html) | Visibility settings of the issue. They describe who is allowed to see the issue. `Can be null`. | | votes | Int |

Number of votes for this issue. `Read-only`.

| | comments | [Array of IssueComments](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueComment.html) | A list of comments for the issue. | | commentsCount | Int | A number of comments in the issue. `Read-only`. | | tags | [Array of IssueTags](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueTag.html) | The list of tags that are added to the issue. | | links | [Array of IssueLinks](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueLink.html) | Issue links (for example, `relates to`, `parent for`, and so on). `Read-only`. | | externalIssue | [ExternalIssue](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-ExternalIssue.html) |

Reference to the issue or similar object in an originating third-party system. `Read-only`. `Can be null`.

| | customFields | [Array of IssueCustomFields](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueCustomField.html) | The collection of custom fields that are present in the issue. `Read-only`. | | voters | [IssueVoters](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueVoters.html) | Object that contains data about voters for the issue and for its duplicates. `Read-only`. | | watchers | [IssueWatchers](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueWatchers.html) | Object that contains data about users watching this issue or its duplicates. `Read-only`. | | attachments | [Array of IssueAttachments](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueAttachment.html) | The list of attachments in the issue. | | subtasks | [IssueLink](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueLink.html) | The list of sub-tasks of the issue. `Read-only`. | | parent | [IssueLink](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/youtrack/devportal/api-entity-IssueLink.html) | The parent issue for the current one. If the issue is not a sub-task of any issue, then null. `Read-only`. |
